thread.title: PARTYNEXTDOOR To Feature On The New Zayn Single
thread.title_full: PARTYNEXTDOOR To Feature On The New Zayn Single

author: Trevor Smith
title: PARTYNEXTDOOR To Feature On The New Zayn Single
text:
Home > Music > PARTYNEXTDOOR To Feature On The New Zayn Single PARTYNEXTDOOR To Feature On The New Zayn Single 0 0 Posted by Trevor Smith , Mar 21, 2017 at 01:44pm It's likely produced by Murda Beatz. 
Zayn has announced "Still Got Time," a new collaboration with PARTYNEXTDOOR . The artwork for the upcoming single has been shared on the singer's Instagram page. The song is set for release this Friday March 24th. A post shared by Zayn Malik (@zayn) on Mar 21, 2017 at 8:08am PDT 
Zayn's 2016 album Mind Of Mine saw the former 1 Direction member embracing his R&B influences, so a collaboration with PND seems like a logical step forward. The OVO singer recently won songwriter of the year at the MTV Woodies for his contributions to Rihanna 's "Work" and "Sex With Me," among others.Frequent Drake and Migos collaborator Murda Beatz has also shared the artwork, suggesting that he's involved in the single with the caption: "Soon Come.. Young Murda." A post shared by YOUNG MURDA (@murdabeatz_) on Mar 21, 2017 at 10:00am PDT 
Both PND and Murda contributed to Drake's new "playlist" More Life . PARTYNEXTDOOR recently featured on Major Lazer 's "Run Up." Expect to hear him on the radio a lot this summer. < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Mar 21, 2017 at 01:44pm 1 View 
The singer made her debut as Marion Crane on the show Monday night. It's likely produced by Murda Beatz. 
Zayn has announced "Still Got Time," a new collaboration with PARTYNEXTDOOR . The artwork for the upcoming single has been shared on the singer's Instagram page. The song is set for release this Friday March 24th. A post shared by Zayn Malik (@zayn) on Mar 21, 2017 at 8:08am PDT 
Zayn's 2016 album Mind Of Mine saw the former 1 Direction member embracing his R&B influences, so a collaboration with PND seems like a logical step forward. The OVO singer recently won songwriter of the year at the MTV Woodies for his contributions to Rihanna 's "Work" and "Sex With Me," among others.Frequent Drake and Migos collaborator Murda Beatz has also shared the artwork, suggesting that he's involved in the single with the caption: "Soon Come.. Young Murda." A post shared by YOUNG MURDA (@murdabeatz_) on Mar 21, 2017 at 10:00am PDT 
Both PND and Murda contributed to Drake's new "playlist" More Life . PARTYNEXTDOOR recently featured on Major Lazer 's "Run Up." Expect to hear him on the radio a lot this summer.
